sentences.sContent: a meeting covering many disparate subjects
sentences.sCn: 涉及许多不同议题的会议

sentences.sContent: the difficulties of dealing with disparate groups of people
sentences.sCn: 和不同的人群打交道的难处

synos.tran: 不同的；不相干的；全异的

remMethod.val: dis(不) + par(相等) + ate → 不相等的 → 迥然不同的

trans.tranOther: consisting of things or people that are very different and not related to each other
